channel.title: Custom items in game problem (allready added)
channel.description:
Hello all, i am trying to add custom items into my server, and its working, but ive hit a small problem.
So, I have: Made the model with metasequioa made the drop model made them both .dat gzipped them created int's put int's and models in proper place changed item.java in server files to fit the item (boots) ive spawned the items in game, they worked, the sword worked fine, but when i attack, it disappears.
Now, im not asking a long responce on how to do this and fix it (because im sure its hard/takes a while and no one will want to take their time to type it all out), im just looking for the name of a program to do it, or a link to a tutorial or somehting along those lines.
thanks

item.dc:creator: @dutchdevil dutchdevil
item.description:
@dutchdevil wrote:

if it should be working, it wouldn’t turn invisible? Maby added wrong animation?

item.title: Custom items in game problem (allready added)
item.dc:creator: @Pina_Coladas Pina Coladas
item.description:
@Pina_Coladas wrote:

Hello all,
i am trying to add custom items into my server, and its working, but ive hit a small problem.

So, I have:
Made the model with metasequioa
made the drop model
made them both .dat
gzipped them
created int’s
put int’s and models in proper place
changed item.java in server files to fit the item (boots)
ive spawned the items in game, they worked, the sword worked fine, but when i attack, it disappears.

Now, im not asking a long responce on how to do this and fix it (because im sure its hard/takes a while and no one will want to take their time to type it all out), im just looking for the name of a program to do it, or a link to a tutorial or somehting along those lines.

thanks

Read full topic
